1.Question: Which technology can automatically adjust compute capacity as demand for an application increases or decreases?

2.Question: Which of the following is an advantage for a company running workloads in the AWS Cloud vs on-premises? (Select TWO.)
Choices: Less staff time is required to launch new workloads.
Increased productivity for application development teams.
Increased time to market for new application features.
Lower overall utilization of server and storage systems.
Higher acquisition costs to support elastic workloads.

3.Question: According to the shared responsibility mode, which security and compliance task is AWS responsible for?
Choices: Granting permissions to users and services

4.Question: How can an organization take advantage of tiered pricing across multiple business units within an organization?

5.Question: A user has limited knowledge of AWS services, but wants to quickly deploy a scalable Node.js application in an Amazon VPC.Which service should be used to deploy the application?

6.Question: Which of the following tasks can a user perform to optimize Amazon EC2 costs? (Select TWO.)
Choices: Create a policy to restrict IAM users from accessing the Amazon EC2 console.
Set a budget to limit spending on Amazon EC2 instances using AWS Budgets.
Implement Auto Scaling groups to add and remove instances based on demand.
Create users in a single Region to reduce the spread of EC2 instances globally.

7.Question: Which combination of steps will enable multi-factor authentication (MFA) on an AWS account? (Select TWO.)
Choices: Contact AWS Support to initiate MFA activation.
Activate the MFA device in the IAM console or by using the AWS CLI.
Activate the MFA device by using Amazon GuardDuty.
Activate AWS Shield on an MFA-compatible device.

8.Question: A cloud practitioner needs to migrate a 70 TB of data from an on-premises data center into the AWS Cloud. The company has a slow and unreliable internet connection.Which AWS service can the cloud practitioner leverage to transfer the data?

9.Question: Which AWS service is a fully-managed source control service that hosts secure Git-based repositories?

10.Question: What can a Cloud Practitioner use the AWS Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) Calculator for?
Choices: Estimate a monthly bill for the AWS Cloud resources that will be used
Estimate savings when comparing the AWS Cloud to an on-premises environment
Generate reports that break down AWS Cloud compute costs by duration, resource, or tags
Enable billing alerts to monitor actual AWS costs compared to estimated costs

11.Question: Which AWS service can be used to perform data extract, transform, and load (ETL) operations so you can prepare data for analytics?

12.Question: Amazon S3 is typically used for which of the following use cases? (Select TWO.)

13.Question: Which AWS dashboard displays relevant and timely information to help users manage events in progress, and provides proactive notifications to help plan for scheduled activities?

14.Question: Which AWS service helps customers meet corporate, contractual, and regulatory compliance requirements for data security by using dedicated hardware appliances within the AWS Cloud?

15.Question: According to the AWS shared responsibility model, which task is the customer's responsibility?
Choices: Updating the operating system of AWS Lambda instances.
Maintaining the infrastructure needed to run Amazon DynamoDB.
Updating the guest operating system on Amazon EC2 instances.

16.Question: What is the function of Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling?
Choices: Scales the size of EC2 instances up or down automatically, based on demand.
Automatically updates the EC2 pricing model, based on demand.
Scales the number of EC2 instances in or out automatically, based on demand.
Automatically modifies the network throughput of EC2 instances, based on demand.

17.Question: Which of the following should be used to improve the security of access to the AWS Management Console? (Select TWO.)

18.Question: Which AWS service can be used to load data from Amazon S3, transform it, and move it to another destination?

19.Question: How should an organization deploy an application running on multiple EC2 instances to ensure that a power failure does not cause an application outage?
Choices: Launch the EC2 instances into Edge Locations
Launch the EC2 instances into different Availability Zones
Launch the EC2 instances in separate regions
Launch the EC2 instances into different VPCs

20.Question: Which AWS service can be used to run Docker containers?

21.Question: A Cloud practitioner wants to know if there are services which can protect from DDoS (Distributed Denial of Service) attacks directed at AWS services.Which AWS service or tool will provide this protection?

22.Question: A Cloud Practitioner wants to configure the AWS CLI for programmatic access to AWS services. Which credential components are required? (Select TWO.)

23.Question: A company needs a consistent and dedicated connection between AWS resources and an on-premise system.Which AWS service can fulfil this requirement?

27.Question: Which of the following are valid best practices for using the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) service? (Select TWO.)
Choices: Grant maximum privileges to IAM users.
Embed access keys in application code.
Use inline policies instead of customer managed policies.
Use groups to assign permissions to IAM users.

28.Question: A company needs to use third-party software for its workload on AWS.Is there a feature or service of AWS that the company can use to purchase the software?

29.Question: Which AWS service is used to send both text and email messages from distributed applications?

30.Question: Which AWS service can act as a hybrid storage solution to connect on-premises workloads with the AWS cloud?

31.Question: According to the shared responsibility model, which security-related task is the responsibility of the customer?
Choices: Securing servers and racks at AWS data centers.
Maintaining firewall configurations at a hardware level.

32.Question: An application has highly dynamic usage patterns. Which characteristics of the AWS Cloud make it cost-effective for this type of workload? (Select TWO.)

33.Question: Which Amazon EC2 tool acts as a virtual firewall to control inbound and outbound traffic to an EC2 instance?

34.Question: Which of the following best describes an Availability Zone in the AWS Cloud?
Choices: One or more edge locations based around the world
A subnet for deploying resources into
One or more physical data centers

35.Question: Which AWS service or feature allows a company to receive a single monthly AWS bill when using multiple AWS accounts?

36.Question: Which cloud architecture design principle is supported by deploying workloads across multiple Availability Zones?

37.Question: Which benefits can a company immediately realize using the AWS Cloud? (Select TWO.)
Choices: Capital expenses are replaced with variable expenses
Variable expenses are replaced with capital expenses

38.Question: A company is interested in moving its on-premises NoSQL database into the AWS Cloud.Which AWS service should the company use to replace their existing database?

39.Question: An eCommerce company plans to use the AWS Cloud to quickly deliver new functionality in an iterative manner, minimizing the time to market.Which feature of the AWS Cloud provides this functionality?

43.Question: Which Amazon EC2 pricing model should be avoided if a workload cannot accept interruption if capacity becomes temporarily unavailable?

44.Question: According to the AWS Shared responsibility model, which two tasks are the responsibility of AWS? (Select TWO.)
Choices: Encrypt client-side data and authenticate data integrity.
Patch the operating system of Amazon S3.
Provide physical security for Availability Zones.

45.Question: Which benefit of AWS enables companies to replace upfront fixed expenses with variable expenses when using on-demand technology services?

46.Question: Which of the following statements are security principles within the AWS Well-Architected Framework? (Select TWO.)
Choices: Protect data in transit and at rest.
Monitor, alert, and audit actions and changes to AWS resources.

47.Question: Which AWS service should a Cloud Practitioner use to establish a secure network connection between an on-premises network and AWS?

48.Question: A user needs an automated security assessment report that will identify unintended network access to Amazon EC2 instances and vulnerabilities on those instances.Which AWS service will provide this assessment report?

49.Question: A Cloud Practitioner noticed that IP addresses that are owned by AWS are being used to attempt to flood ports on some of the company’s systems.To whom should the issue be reported?

51.Question: Which of the statements below is correct in relation to Consolidated Billing? (Select TWO.)
Choices: You are charged a fee per user
You can combine usage and share volume pricing discounts
You receive one bill per AWS account
You pay a fee per linked account
You receive a single bill for multiple accounts

52.Question: What AWS service, tool, or feature can help companies identify underutilized Amazon EC2 instances and reduce their costs?

53.Question: A company plan to move the application development to AWS. Which benefits can they achieve when developing and running applications in the AWS Cloud compared to on-premises? (Select TWO.)
Choices: AWS can accommodate large changes in application demand.
AWS automatically replicates all data globally.
AWS makes it easy to implement high availability.
AWS will fully manage the entire application.
AWS takes care of application security patching.

Choices: Network infrastructure in the data center

63.Question: What should a Cloud Practitioner ensure when designing a highly available architecture on AWS?
Choices: The failure of a single component should not affect the application.
Servers have low-latency and high throughput network connectivity.
A single monolithic application component handles all operations.
There are enough servers to run at peak load available at all times.
